key.name: copy-to-clipboard
key.description: Automatically copy the transcribed text to the clipboard.

key.name: extension-status
key.description: Internal setting used to communicate the application status to the optional GNOME Shell extension. The extension uses this to adjust the icon color in the top bar.

key.name: extension-error
key.description: Internal setting used to communicate error messages to the optional GNOME Shell extension. The extension uses this to display desktop notifications when errors occur.

key.name: save-transcriptions
key.description: Save audio recordings and transcriptions to disk for benchmarking and analysis purposes.

key.name: recording-timeout-seconds
key.description: Maximum recording duration in seconds before transcription starts automatically.

key.name: language
key.description: ISO 639-1 language code for speech recognition.

key.name: joystick-id
key.description: ID of the joystick device to use for triggering. -1 means no joystick configured.

key.name: joystick-language-left
key.description: ISO 639-1 language code for the left joystick button.

key.name: joystick-language-right
key.description: ISO 639-1 language code for the right joystick button.

key.name: faster-whisper-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the Faster Whisper transcriber.

key.name: faster-whisper-model
key.description: The Faster Whisper model to use for transcription.

key.name: faster-whisper-device
key.description: The device to use for Faster Whisper: cpu, cuda, or auto.

key.name: openai-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the OpenAI transcriber.

key.name: openai-base-url
key.description: Optional custom base URL for OpenAI API (leave empty for default).

key.name: openai-api-key
key.description: API key for OpenAI transcription service.

key.name: openai-model
key.description: The OpenAI model to use for transcription.

key.name: fallback-timeout-seconds
key.description: Timeout in seconds before falling back from cloud to local transcription.

key.name: typist-backend
key.description: Backend to use for typing text: auto, atspi, xdotool, or ydotool.
